headline: Smart Glasses or Stupid Cyborg?
description:
Smart glasses or stupid cyborg? And did Google create artificial sentience? Or did Google just create the perfect pitch to send AI sentiments to the Disneyland of public relations? Read and decide!

https://www.vrilock.com/single-post/smart-glasses-or-stupid-cyborgs
headline_zh-Hans: 智能眼镜还是愚蠢的半机械人？
headline_zh-Hant: 智能眼鏡還是愚蠢的半機械人？
description_zh-Hans:
智能眼镜还是愚蠢的机械人？ 而谷歌是否创造了人工智能？ 还是谷歌只是创造了一个完美的音符，将人工智能的情感送到了公共关系的迪斯尼乐园？阅读并决定！

https://www.vrilock.com/single-post/smart-glasses-or-stupid-cyborgs
description_zh-Hant:
智能眼鏡還是愚蠢的機械人？ 而谷歌是否創造了人工智能？ 還是谷歌只是創造了一個完美的音符，將人工智能的情感送到了公共關係的迪斯尼樂園？閱讀並決定！

https://www.vrilock.com/single-post/smart-glasses-or-stupid-cyborgs
